item.title: [Global][OperatingSystem] - AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 unavailable for Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B boards
item.description:
Jul 17, 09:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 30/06/2023 00:00 UTC
End Time : 17/07/2023 09:00 UTC
Root cause : A kernel update on AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 13, 07:18 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 12, 17:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 30/06/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 can no longer be installed on Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B motherboards due to a kernel-related networking bug.
Root cause : A kernel update on AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9.
Ongoing actions : Our team is monitoring the upstream bug report at https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2222037

item.title: VPS - BHS2 - host391404
item.description:
Jul 15, 05:09 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 15, 03:27 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 4 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host391404

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.
